name: Blue vs The Sandwich Invasion
description:
NOTE: If the game isn't working for you on chrome, try a different browser like firefox instead. Chrome has been known to have weird issues with web assembly.

A game where you're a wizard that shoots fireballs at sandwich monsters. Made for the 2018 Butterscotch Shenanijam.

This project is open source and can be found here.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows: Move.
  • Left/Right click: Shoot fireballs!
  • Space: Dash (if unlocked).
  • Escape: Pause.

Achievements:

  • 3-bit color palette.
  • Tango (team of two).

Credits:

  • Programming: CrazyGuy108.
  • Art and sound effects: player0gaming.

Assets:

  • Song: "Cool Adventure Intro" by Eric Matyas.
  • Font: 8 Bit Wonder by Joiro Hatgaya (freeware).
